name: Enigma: Mystery One
description:
Can you survive your first day on the job as a rookie detective? With as many pronoun choices as you can possibly imagine and a cast of colourful characters, this detective mystery romp aims to warm the heart. But will you solve the mystery before it's too late?

A game by Team Yellow Dinosaur: a group of game dev newbies and one game engine developer. We hope your enjoy our light-hearted little adventure made especially for 'My First Game Jam, Winter 2018'.

Made using Ren'py. May contain bugs and / or nuts.
